cmd_in01,117,165,8	script	Armor Dealer#ComArm1	92,{
if(faction != $comfaction) {
	mes "[^0000ffArmor Dealer^000000]";
	mes "Beat it chump!";
	close;
	}
callshop "ComArm01",0;
}

-	shop	ComArm01	139,2226:-1,2228:-1,2103:-1,2105:-1,2405:-1,2503:-1,2505:-1,2305:-1,2321:-1,2307:-1,2309:-1,2335:-1,2312:-1,2314:-1,2316:-1
